modules.title: Fields & Roles
modules.instructions: List four engineering disciplines (e.g., civil, mechanical, electrical, environmental) and an example project for each.

quiz.q: Put these in order: prototype, define problem, test, brainstorm.

quiz.a: Testing reveals improvements; iteration optimizes performance and safety.

modules.title: Build a Prototype
modules.instructions: Design and build a small device (bridge, catapult, gear toy, sensor mount). Upload sketch, materials list, photos, and what you tested.

modules.title: Test & Iterate
modules.instructions: Record 2–3 test trials (what changed, results). Explain one improvement you made and why.

modules.title: Safety & Ethics
modules.prompt: List three safety steps you followed while building/testing and one ethical responsibility engineers have to the public.
